Hellplague/ Malice:

Hellplague urns and begins to monitor the developement of the clone.  
It wouldn't take long, but just to be safe, she monitored it 
nonetheless.
"Tell them, I will take Dark Fate and the Sweeps down to the planet 
to destroy the cannon.  If it is needed, Malice will lead the rest of 
us down and help," Hellplague said, not looking up from her console.

"Me?" Malice said, honestly suprised.
"Does Unicron trust me with such a task?" he asked in an almost 
childlike tone.
